Literature.Title: Tryptic Stability of Synthetic Bactenecin Derivatives Is Determined by the Side Chain Length of Cationic Residues and the Peptide Conformation.
Literature.Author: Bagheri M, Arasteh S, Haney EF, Hancock RE

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli O157:H7(MIC=2.5µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 17978(MIC=5µM),Bacillus subtilis C626(MIC=10µM),Staphylococcus aureus C622(MIC=2.5µM)
